headline: Media Mogul Is Upbeat on Spinoff. The Alaskan Telecom Debuted Cheaply.
summary: FEATURE  The market may be missing something the media mogul John Malone sees. He is high on GCI Liberty, an Alaskan telecom and broadband spinoff from his Liberty Broadband that began trading on the Nasdaq on Tuesday.

headline: GE Vernova Adding 250 New Jobs as Part of Pennsylvania Factory Expansion to Manufacture More Critical Grid Technologies
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., July 15, 2025--As energy demand continues to surge, GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) plans to add 250 new jobs over the next two years at the company’s leading grid solutions factory in Charleroi, PA.

headline: American energy revival takes shape as GE Vernova pours millions into Pennsylvania economy
summary: Energy company GE Vernova expands Pennsylvania operations with an $80 million investment, adding 250 jobs at its Charleroi facility for electric grid infrastructure.
